thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Geoff Rogers

author: Geoff Rogers
title: Geoff Rogers
text:
An ideal way of being able to go away with no worries that pets & house will be well looked after. We have used TrustedHousitters several times now and can only rate them as excellent. We have had no problems finding sitters, our only difficulty being trying to decide which one of the many applicants to select. Sitters are friendly, fit in with the animals routines and we return to a clean house, often a warm meal and pets that seem not to realise we have been away.
Can not praise the sitters or the organisation enough.
